title: New River Gorge National River: Outdoor Adventure Festival
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Ranger Programs     Outdoor Adventure Festival                Outdoor Adventure Festival          Â    Join us for Outdoor Adventure Fest 2016!   Celebrate parks and health in the outdoors!Learn how to play, stay safe, and practice ouutdoor ethics on any outdoor adventure at this hands-on festival in New River Gorge National River.      Saturday, July 30, 2016 10:00 am to 3:00 pm at Grandview    Adventure Street Fair Featuring:  Early Birding 9:00 am Tai Chi Class 10:30 am Photography - Beckley Camera Club GPS Wayfinding  Guided walks 10:30 am, 12:30 pm, 2:00 pm Fly Tying and Casting - Trout Unlimited, Southern WV Chapter Active Southern WV  Junior Ranger Centennial Badge  Leave No Trace Outdoor Ethics  Enviroscape - Piney Creek Watershed  Recycling Tips - Raleigh County Solid Waste Authority  YMCA Healthy Lifestyles    *Check back soon for times and further information  Sunday July 31, 2016  11:00 am to 1:00 pm at Canyon Rim Visitor Center    Subaru Leave No Trace Traveling Trainers Meet this national team and learn hot outdoor ethics tips
